seg-source.mrk: Limitations of <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Limitations du <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: Format

target.mrk: Format

trans-unit.source: SIDF is the only supported data format. Tina and TAR are not supported.

seg-source.mrk: SIDF is the only supported data format.
Tina and TAR are not supported.

target.mrk: Seul le format de données SIDF est supporté.
Les formats Tina et TAR ne sont pas supportés.

seg-source.mrk: Encrypted Data

target.mrk: Données cryptées.

trans-unit.source: It is not recommended to deduplicate encrypted data. This type of data may vary at each backup which can affect the deduplication rate.

seg-source.mrk: It is not recommended to deduplicate encrypted data.
This type of data may vary at each backup which can affect the deduplication rate.

target.mrk: Il n'est pas recommandé de dédupliquer les données cryptées.
Ce type de données peut varier à chaque sauvegarde, ce qui peut affecter le taux de déduplication.

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> generates an alarm when you try to apply encryption on a backup selection. If your backup strategy is associated with a HyperStream pool, the alarm activates during the selection process or through the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.scm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.The alarm warns you that such encryption lowers the deduplication rate.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> generates an alarm when you try to apply encryption on a backup selection.

If your backup strategy is associated with a HyperStream pool, the alarm activates during the selection process or through the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.scm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.The alarm warns you that such encryption lowers the deduplication rate.

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> génère une alarme lorsque vous utilisez le cryptage dans une sélection de sauvegarde.

Si votre stratégie de sauvegarde est associée à un jeu HyperStream, l'alarme s'active pendant le processus de sélection ou via le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.scm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />. L'alarme vous avertit que ce type de cryptage diminue le ratio de déduplication.

trans-unit.source: If you are using an operating system based on encryption such as <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2020-06-12T15:30:02.4457663+02:00" MadCap:creator="tychom" MadCap:initials="TY" MadCap:comment="Bitlock vs EFS => see with LCH or François for details" MadCap:editor="tychom" MadCap:editDate="2020-06-12T15:30:31.0094135+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">EFS</MadCap:annotation> on Windows, this also affects the deduplication rate. However, no alarm is generated in that case since <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> does not have any control over the encryption.

seg-source.mrk: If you are using an operating system based on encryption such as <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2020-06-12T15:30:02.4457663+02:00" MadCap:creator="tychom" MadCap:initials="TY" MadCap:comment="Bitlock vs EFS => see with LCH or François for details" MadCap:editor="tychom" MadCap:editDate="2020-06-12T15:30:31.0094135+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">EFS</MadCap:annotation> on Windows, this also affects the deduplication rate.
However, no alarm is generated in that case since <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> does not have any control over the encryption.

target.mrk: Si votre système d’exploitation utilise le cryptage, par exemple, <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2020-06-12T15:30:02.4457663+02:00" MadCap:creator="tychom" MadCap:initials="TY" MadCap:comment="Bitlock vs EFS => see with LCH or François for details" MadCap:editor="tychom" MadCap:editDate="2020-06-12T15:30:31.0094135+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">EFS</MadCap:annotation> sur Windows, le ratio de déduplication sera affecté aussi.
Cependant, aucune alarme n'est générée dans ce cas car <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> n'a aucun contrôle sur le cryptage.

seg-source.mrk: Installation of several <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>s

target.mrk: Installation de plusieurs <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>

trans-unit.source: Replicating an <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A to an <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B is supported only if the two servers are installed on different physical servers (or virtual machines). It is highly recommended that these servers have the same architecture and the same operating system.

seg-source.mrk: Replicating an <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A to an <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B is supported only if the two servers are installed on different physical servers (or virtual machines).
It is highly recommended that these servers have the same architecture and the same operating system.

target.mrk: La réplication d’un <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A vers un <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B n’est supportée que si les deux serveurs sont installés sur des serveurs physiques (ou des machines virtuelles) différents.
Il est fortement recommandé que l'architecture et le système d’exploitation de ces serveurs soient identiques.

seg-source.mrk: Duplication

target.mrk: Duplication

trans-unit.source: While the duplication of HyperStream data to a VLS is supported, the duplication of VLS tapes, or physical tapes, to an <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is not supported.

seg-source.mrk: While the duplication of HyperStream data to a VLS is supported, the duplication of VLS tapes, or physical tapes, to an <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is not supported.

target.mrk: Alors que la duplication de données HyperStream vers une VLS est supportée, la duplication de bandes VLS, ou de bandes physiques, vers un <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> n’est pas supportée.

seg-source.mrk: Network Disks

target.mrk: Disques réseau

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> does not support deduplication across network drives or mounted NFS/CIFS volumes.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> does not support deduplication across network drives or mounted NFS/CIFS volumes.

target.mrk: Le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> ne supporte pas la déduplication à travers les disques réseau ni les montages NFS/CIFS.

seg-source.mrk: Disk to Disk to Tape (D2D2T)

target.mrk: Disk-to-Disk-to-Tape (D2D2T)

trans-unit.source: D2D2T is a backup strategy where data is initially backed up on VLS and, subsequently, on physical tapes. It is recommended to only use <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> with D2D2T for long-term backup retention (several months or years). This enables to secure data for a long period and to increase the deduplication ratio.

seg-source.mrk: D2D2T is a backup strategy where data is initially backed up on VLS and, subsequently, on physical tapes.

It is recommended to only use <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> with D2D2T for long-term backup retention (several months or years).
This enables to secure data for a long period and to increase the deduplication ratio.

target.mrk: D2D2T est une stratégie de sauvegarde dans laquelle les données sont d'abord sauvegardées sur VLS et, ensuite, sur des bandes physiques.

Il est recommandé d'utiliser le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> uniquement avec D2D2T pour une rétention de sauvegarde à long terme (plusieurs mois ou années).
Cela permet de sécuriser les données pendant une longue période et d'augmenter le taux de déduplication.
